meta.name: Observer – Full K8s & Host Dashboard
meta.description: Comprehensive monitoring dashboard for Kubernetes and host systems

attributes.name: Observer – Full K8s & Host Dashboard
attributes.description: Comprehensive monitoring dashboard for Kubernetes and host systems with enhanced visualizations

attributes.query:
from(bucket: "metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system_metrics" and r._field == "cpu_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.agent_id =~ /${agent_id}/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")
attributes.name: Host CPU Query

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.agent_id =~ /${agent_id}/ and r.ns =~ /${namespace}/ and r.pod_name =~ /${pod_name}/)

attributes.query:
from(bucket: "metrics")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "pod_metrics" and r._field == "cpu_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.agent_id =~ /${agent_id}/ and r.ns =~ /${namespace}/ and r.pod_name =~ /${pod_name}/)
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["pod_name", "_value"])
  |> group()
  |> sort(columns: ["_value"], desc: true)
  |> limit(n: 10)
  |> yield(name: "top_cpu")

attributes.query:
from(bucket: "metrics")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system_metrics" and (r._field == "network_bytes_in" or r._field == "network_bytes_out"))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.agent_id =~ /${agent_id}/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> yield(name: "derivative")
